price: Nígbà náà, kò níí sí agbára tàbí alárànṣe kan fún un.
arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: famā lahu min quwwatin walā nāṣirin
